thread.title: Miss Cheryl Gregory
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Miss Cheryl Gregory

author: Miss Cheryl Gregory
title: Miss Cheryl Gregory
text: I found the website for Shower doctor very simple to use and the videos were particularly useful. The only thing that let the service down was the fact that I paid extra for next day delivery and didn't receive the item until two days later.
